item.title: exploring NUFORC sightings
item.description: R code used for each of the graphics is available here. While flipping through an issue of the Economist a few years ago, I stumbled across an article summarizing UFO sightings reported across the US. It wasnâ€™t a full feature, but the topic was playful and I lingered on it longer than I spent with the rest of the issue.
